LanguageData.Door.label: ajtó
LanguageData.Door.description: Szobákat köt össze. Kézzel kell nyitni/zárni, ez lelassítja a gyarmatosokat.
LanguageData.Door_Blueprint.label: door (blueprint)
LanguageData.Door_Frame.label: door (building)
LanguageData.Door_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.Autodoor.label: automata ajtó
LanguageData.Autodoor.description: Szobákat köt össze. Árammal működő változat. Lelassulás nélkül lehet áthaladni rajta.
LanguageData.Autodoor_Blueprint.label: autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Autodoor_Frame.label: autodoor (building)
LanguageData.Autodoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Wall.label: fal
LanguageData.Wall.description: Stabil fal, ami képes megtartani a tetőt.
LanguageData.Wall_Blueprint.label: wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.Wall_Frame.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.Wall_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
